Posts.Content: Apr 18, 2009 04:55PM traci126 wrote: My thoughts and prayers are with your family.  St. Jude Childrens Research Hospital web site has a lot of good information and links.  It's at stjude.org.  I was treated there as a child and continue to go to their website to get information on health situations I need to be on the lookout for.  They treat solid tumors which is what I had and what it sounds like this might be qualified as. Good luck Monday with the first appointment.  Traci
Posts.Title: HELP! 10 year old with bc cjsocal Mary-Lou
